mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 1251) for an order placed by Preston Temple for 300 two color window cards for Thrills Spills Don't Miss It at the Murfreesboro Road Speedway in Smyrna, Tennessee on April 17. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
